text: Michman Panin () is a 1960 Soviet war movie directed by Mikhail Shveitser.Коллеги и близкие простятся с актером Леонидом КуравлевымМИЧМАН ПАНИН It stars Vyacheslav Tikhonov, Nikolai Sergeyev, and Nikita Podgorny. ==Actors== * Vyacheslav Tikhonov as Vasily Panin * Nikolai Sergeyev as Nikolai Vasilyevich Sergeyev * Nikita Podgorny as Vedernikov * Leonid Kuravlyov as Pyotr Kamushkin * Ivan Pereverzev as Ivan Grigoryev * Lev Polyakov as Gruzinov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1960 movies Category:Soviet war movies
title: Michman Panin
